00017 // the constructor
00018 BuildCommand::BuildCommand(QDomNode &buildCommandNode):
00019 BuildModel(buildCommandNode), targetName_(QString()),
00020 targetNameAttributes_() {
00021 
00022         for (int i = 0; i < buildCommandNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00023                 QDomNode tempNode = buildCommandNode.childNodes().at(i);
00024 
00025                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:targetName")) {
00026                         targetName_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00027                         General::parseAttributes(tempNode, targetNameAttributes_);
00028                 }
00029         }
00030         return;
00031 }

00058 void BuildCommand::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00059         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:buildCommand");
00060 
00061         // call base class write() to write base class information
00062         BuildModel::write(writer);
00063 
00064         if (!targetName_.isEmpty()) {
00065                 // start the spirit:targetName tag
00066                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:targetName");
00067 
00068                 // write the attributes for the element
00069                 General::writeAttributes(writer, targetNameAttributes_);
00070 
00071                 // write the value of the element and close the tag
00072                 writer.writeCharacters(targetName_);
00073                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:targetName
00074         }
00075 
00076         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:buildCommand
00077 }
